author: psmith
msg: Refactored LogPanel and Menu & Toolbar class so they are decoupled.
LogPanel is now responsible for it's own undocked Toolbar
actions.
The find option now at least doens't cause a ClassCastException,
but it's still operating a little oddly.  Will replace this mechanism
with a series of Finder-style objects.

author: ceki
msg: Joran starts doing more. It already handles errors better than DOMConfigurator.
More actions to follow.

author: ceki
msg: In the substVat method changed the order of replacement. The props
argument is seached first and only if that fails the system properties are
searched.
This is in agreement with the principle whereby locals values override
globals and not the other way around.

author: psmith
msg: a large number of changes done as a further effort to decouple
LogPanel from LogUI.  LogPanel now only needs a reference
to the StatusBar, and this too can be eventually removed
by replacing with a listener style framework. (coming
soon).
LogPanel now contains all the unique values of LoggingEvents
in the new FilterModel.
One caveat of this change is that the Undocked window now
has no Toolbar, further effort required to relink this in, but
the undocked window is is still usable if you use the right
click menu.

author: psmith
msg: now fires a PropertyChangeEvent when the docked property
is modified.
